Critical.Suggestion: Adicione verificação de erro: if err != nil { ... }

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Para cada erro não tratado, decida:
   a) Retornar o erro (wrap com context)
   b) Logar e continuar
   c) Logar e retornar
2. Adicione if err != nil { } manualmente

Examples: error: failed to check packages: errors while loading package github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component.test]: [-: # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component.test]

test\component\task_service_test.go:435:2: declared and not used: userID E:\vertikon\business\SaaS\templates\mcp-ultra\test\component\task_service_test.go:403:2: declared and not used: adminUserID E:\vertikon\business\SaaS\templates\mcp-ultra\test\component\task_service_test.go:435:2: declared and not used: userID]

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: level=error msg="[linters_context] typechecking error: : # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/test/component.test]\ntest\\component\\task_service_test.go:403:2: declared and not used: adminUserID\ntest\\component\\task_service_test.go:435:2: declared and not used: userID"
